output.sentences: We first arrived on the city square to see the guards in classic read coat garb.
The guard turned face and saluted the limo coming down the street.
Then the limo stopped and the man exited to walk up the steps.
Security was thick throughout the crowd with even armed horseback guards.
Then a casket came out of the car and I was aware that it was a funeral.
